statements: SELECT * FROM patient_health_data WHERE health_status = 'good';
SELECT patient_name, checkup_date FROM patient_health_data ORDER BY checkup_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, health_status FROM patient_health_data WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM patient_health_data WHERE checkup_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patient_health_data WHERE health_status = 'poor';
SELECT * FROM patient_health_data WHERE health_status = 'Healthy' ORDER BY checkup_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, health_status FROM patient_health_data WHERE patient_id = 5;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patient_health_data WHERE health_status != 'Healthy' ORDER BY patient_id ASC, checkup_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_health_data WHERE checkup_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients, health_status FROM patient_health_data GROUP BY health_status ORDER BY total_patients DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'FEMALE';
SELECT patient_id, name, age FROM Patients ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM HealthRecords WHERE record_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT diagnosis, treatment FROM HealthRecords WHERE patient_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT p.name, hr.diagnosis FROM Patients p JOIN HealthRecords hr ON p.patient_id = hr.patient_id WHERE hr.record_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT p.name, p.age, hr.diagnosis FROM Patients p LEFT JOIN HealthRecords hr ON p.patient_id = hr.patient_id WHERE p.gender = 'Male' AND hr.diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT hr.record_date, p.name, hr.diagnosis FROM HealthRecords hr INNER JOIN Patients p ON hr.patient_id = p.patient_id WHERE p.age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY hr.record_date ASC;
SELECT p.name, hr.diagnosis, hr.treatment FROM Patients p RIGHT JOIN HealthRecords hr ON p.patient_id = hr.patient_id WHERE p.DOB < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM HealthRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'Influenza';
SELECT height, weight, measurement_date FROM Measurements ORDER BY measurement_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT record_id, diagnosis, medication, doctor FROM HealthRecords WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';

SELECT patient_name, weight, height, temperature FROM Patients JOIN HealthRecords ON Patients.patient_id = HealthRecords.patient_id JOIN Measurements ON HealthRecords.record_id = Measurements.record_id WHERE age >= 50;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE height > 170
SELECT patient_name, visit_date FROM patients JOIN visits ON patients.patient_id = visits.patient_id
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, hospital_name FROM doctors
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%'
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY height DESC, weight ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender, height, weight FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31'
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth, gender, height, weight FROM patients p JOIN visits v ON p.patient_id = v.patient_id WHERE v.visit_date >= '2022-01-01'

SELECT p.patient_name, h.diagnosis, h.medication, d.doctor_name FROM patients p JOIN health_records h ON p.patient_id = h.patient_id JOIN doctors d ON h.record_id = d.doctor_id WHERE p.gender = 'Female' AND d.specialization = 'Cardiology'
SELECT doctor_name, COUNT(*) AS visit_count FROM doctors d JOIN visits v ON d.doctor_id = v.doctor_id GROUP BY doctor_name ORDER BY visit_count DESC
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_diagnosis FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE heart_rate > 80;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, side_effects FROM medications WHERE medication_type = 'Antibiotic';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, patient_diagnosis FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE blood_pressure LIKE '12%';
SELECT medication_name, dosage, side_effects FROM medications WHERE medication_type = 'Painkiller' AND dosage = '50mg';
SELECT * FROM treatments WHERE cost > 1000 AND efficacy_rating > 8 ORDER BY cost ASC, efficacy_rating DESC;
